metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5531 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in Elasticsearch before 1.6.1 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors related to snapshot API calls.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5531` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

elasticsearch - 1.7.3+dfsg-3
libelasticsearch1.7-java - 1.7.3+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elasticsearch package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.3+dfsg-3').
